__e: The terrorists have given you six Earth days to bring him here or the hostages will die.
The terrorists have killed 19 first responders with another 30 unaccounted for.
We have learned that the terrorists have control of the airport, a fact that the authorities have repressed.
The terrorists have been captured or killed. And, best of all, this has all been accomplished with no further loss of innocent life.
And worse... because one of those terrorists... is one of our own.
Your fight against the terrorists is our fight.
Anyone... everyone hearing these words can help to root out the terrorists who would seek to upset the order and balance we now enjoy.
Powell, has it occurred to you... .. he could be one of the terrorists,... .. or some nutcase in there?
The government hasn't done anything to stop Los Pepes, those terrorists who have attacked my family and murdered my associates.
